data.title: How to: change your Windows Server 2003 license / producy key
data.meta_description: 1. Click Start, click Run, type regedit, and then click OK. 2. In the left pane, locate and then click the following registry subkey: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\WindowsNT\Current Version\WPAEvents 3. In the right pane, right-click OOBETimer, and then click Modify. 4.Change at least one digit of the OOBETimer value to deactivate Windows. 5. Click Start, click Run, typeâ€¦
data.text:
1. Click Start, click Run, type regedit, and then click OK.

2. In the left pane, locate and then click the following registry subkey:

HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\WindowsNT\Current Version\WPAEvents

3. In the right pane, right-click OOBETimer, and then click Modify.

4.Change at least one digit of the OOBETimer value to deactivate Windows.

5. Click Start, click Run, type the following command, and then click OK:

%systemroot%\system32\oobe\msoobe.exe /a

6. Click Yes, I want to telephone a customer service representative to activate Windows, and then click Next.

7. Click Change Product key, type the new product key in the New key boxes, and then click Update.
